street.description: A name, expressed as text, of a street or thoroughfare.

city.description: The name, expressed as text, of the city, town or village of this address.

country.description: A unique country identifier for this party.

postcode.description: A code specifying the postcode of the address.

witness.description: In witness whereof this MTD has been signed

bookingNumber.description: The unique identifier assigned by the carrier to this consignment when cargo space is reserved prior to loading.

sequence.description: The sequence number for this consignment item.

information.description: Information, expressed as text, for this consignment item.

code.description: The harmonized system code specifying a type of consignment item.

issue.description: A date, time, date time or other date time value for an issuance of this document.

originalIssued.description: The number of originals issued for this document.

copyIssued.description: The number of copies issued for this document.

name.description: A name, expressed as text, of this logistics related location.

UNLocode.description: United Nations Location Code (UNLOCODE) unique identifier for logistics related location.

printedLocation.description: The location exactly as printed on the document.

name.description: A name, expressed as text, for this party.

printedParty.description: The party name and address exactly as printed on the document.

type.description: Description specifying the type of logistics seal.

identifier.description: A unique identifier for this logistics seal.

shippingMarks.description: Physical shipping marks and barcode information for this logistics package.

equipmentNumber.description: Unique identifier for this piece of transport equipment, printed physically on the equipment.
Unique identifier for this piece of transport equipment, printed physically on the equipment.

equipmentType.description: ISO 6346 size and type code (for example "45G1")

printedEquipmentType.description: The container size and type, as printed on the transport document (for example "40 DRY 9''6").

Identification.description: An identifier of this logistics means of transport, such as the International Maritime Organization number of a vessel.

name.description: The name, expressed as text, of this logistics means of transport such as the vessel name.

Identification.description: To identify a journey of a means of transport, for example voyage number, flight number, trip number.

quantity.description: The number of logistics packages at this level.

type.description: A type, expressed as text, of this logistics package.

layout.title: Authentication (signed) for and on behalf of the MTO
